text:
Good morning, Chiyuki──
what's wrong? You look down.

Oh, it's… nothing!
It's just that it was a bit chilly outside...
Ah, it's been cloudy since this morning.

I thought it would be okay since the forecast
said it would clear up in the afternoon...

Then, I'll make you something warm to drink.
How about coffee?

Oh, no need to worry about me…!
I can handle that myself──

It's okay, sit down.
I'll also bring you a blanket later.
